title: Unlock the Power of Video Learning
subtitle: Veenotes helps you learn faster and more effectively from online videos.

benefits.title: Quick Bookmarking
benefits.description: Easily save key moments while watching, creating instant reference points for faster reviews and enhanced focus on important content.

benefits.title: Organized Collections
benefits.description: Group videos by topics or courses, keeping all your resources neatly organized for easy access and a streamlined learning experience.

benefits.title: Timestamped Notes
benefits.description: Capture detailed insights by adding notes at exact timestamps, helping you retain information tied directly to specific video moments.

benefits.title: Instant Access Points
benefits.description: Quickly jump to saved sections without endless scrolling, making reviews faster and focusing your learning on what truly matters.

benefits.title: Memory Boost
benefits.description: Reinforce key ideas by summarizing them in notes, creating a stronger connection and better long-term retention of crucial concepts.

benefits.title: Personalized Learning
benefits.description: Learn at your pace with customized bookmarks, so you can revisit difficult concepts and keep track of your progress easily.

benefits.title: Effortless Search
benefits.description: Find saved bookmarks and notes instantly with smart search, so you never waste time looking for important content.

benefits.title: Enhanced Focus
benefits.description: Avoid unnecessary distractions by isolating important moments, allowing you to focus on meaningful content and stay engaged.
